name: Growing Watermelons
description:
Originally created for McGameJam 2018, now released on the android play store is Growing Watermelons. 

The game is designed for mobile devices, please check it out on the play store if you have an android device.

This is a grid-based gardening puzzle game where you will use your crops to grow as many watermelons as possible. For more information check out the ingame tutorial.

While it's not a level based puzzle game, there some logical walls at around 8, 16, and 22 watermelons that do require some thinking to beat. I've only managed to get a highscore of 24 myself.

~~ I will be awarding a bounty of $30 to the first person that can attain a score of 25+ watermelons!! ~~

I hope you give my game a try and please message me if you have any questions / comments !
